1212030.name: ARIDA 2: Rise of the Brave
1212030.description:
Face the challenges of the most arid regions of the 19th-century Brazilian backlands to complete a migratory journey filled with touching stories.

A single-player game that blends elements of adventure, exploration, and survival!

Gather resources, craft utensils, use tools, interact with other travelers, and experience the emotions of other residents of the Brazilian backlands in this historical, narrative-driven game!
